Solar power.Description: Solar power is generated using solar panels, which convert sunlight into electricity.
Solar power is a major source of renewable energy, helping reduce reliance on fossil fuels.
Solar power systems need to be integrated into the electrical grid for efficient distribution and utilization.
Large-scale solar power generation is often done through solar farms, which consist of multiple solar panels.
